name: ITP - CHIPSEAL RENEWAL INSPECTION TESTING PLAN
template name: ITP - CHIPSEAL RENEWAL INSPECTION TESTING PLAN Rev 1

name: Preliminaries
Material Test Method Requirement - Has all preseal repairs been completed?
Reference Documents - Insert Layer Acceptance ITP No
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Workpack closeout record
Material Test Frequency - Prior to sealing commencing
Target Criteria - All underlying layers meets project requirements
Action Point Records Required - Hold Point
Responsibility - SE / CE / PM / PQE
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
Material Test Method Requirement - Bitumen Sprayer
Reference Documents - TNZ P3
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Certification provided
Material Test Frequency - Prior to starting
Target Criteria - Current E/2 Certificate
Action Point Records Required - Certificate Sheet
Responsibility - SE / CE / PM / PQE
Chip Seal Application
Material Test Method Requirement - Seal Design
Reference Documents - INSERT SEAL DESIGN
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - TNZ M/1 Table 1 Tests
Material Test Frequency - Prior to sealing commencing (Minimum 1 week prior to application)
Target Criteria - Meets project requirements
Action Point Records Required - Hold Point
Responsibility - PQE / CE / PM
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
2.02 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - GO/NO GO Survey
Reference Documents - Downer survay sealing Go/NO GO , road science Zeus app  & Downer Iris app.
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Downers Procedures
Material Test Frequency - prior to sealing on each site
Target Criteria - Pass on GO/NO GO , Marginal &discussion with contract manager or approval from Rehab manager
Action Point Records Required - Hold Point
Responsibility - PQE / CE / PM
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
Material Test Method Requirement - Has the material used in this layer been formally accepted for use?
Reference Documents - Insert Material Testing
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - See PQE
Material Test Frequency - Prior to construction commencing
Target Criteria - Material meets project requirements
Action Point Records Required - Hold Point
Responsibility - PQE / CE / PM
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
2.04 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - Pre-seal Inspection
Reference Documents - TNZ P3:1995.7
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Downers Procedures
Material Test Frequency - 100% of Surface Prior to sealing
Target Criteria - The surface shall then be swept clean of loose aggregate, dust, dirt and other deleterious matter.
○ Street Furniture and Start and End poitns have been taped and/or masked for overspray
○ Line marking tags are in place.
Action Point Records Required - Hold Point
Responsibility - PQE / CE / PM
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
2.05 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - Road temp
Reference Documents - TNZ P3:1995.18
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Temperature recorded on site prior to sealing commencing
Material Test Frequency - Once per day of sealing prior to sealing commencing
Target Criteria - Air temp >10°C
Action Point Records Required - Spray Sheet
Responsibility - SE / CE / PM
2.06 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - Application Rate
Reference Documents - TNZ P3 : 1995.18
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Quantity of binder sprayed in any spray run measured by dipstick reading or a calibrated accumulating rev counter fiited to sprayer
Material Test Frequency - Dipstick measurements before spraying is commenced from tank and after the last spray from the tank or prior to it's refilling
Target Criteria - binder application rate is +/-50ltrs + 4% of the application rate
Action Point Records Required - Spray Sheet
Responsibility - SE / CE / PM
2.07 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - Chip spread rate
Reference Documents - TNZ P3: 1995.21
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - area sealed (m2) to be divided by the volume of chip spread (m3), Chipsealing in New Zealand (pg 435)
Material Test Frequency - Total amount of chip used to be calculated at end of days sealing
Target Criteria - Visual checks meets seal design requirements
Action Point Records Required - Witness Point/Spray sheet
Responsibility - SE / CE / PM
2.08 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - Rolling Checks
Reference Documents - TNZ P3: 1995.22
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Sealing Record
Material Test Frequency - for each sealing site per day
Target Criteria - As per rolling requirements defined in TNZ P3: 1995.22.
Action Point Records Required - Witness Point/Spray sheet
Responsibility - SE / CE / PM
2.09 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - Post-seal Inspection
Reference Documents - TNZ P3: 1995
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - Engineers Inspection
Material Test Frequency - 100% of Site After sealing (within 5 days)
Target Criteria - The chip is embedded, uniformily placed and chipseal is fit for purpose
○ Line marking has been reinstated
○ All excess chip has been removed from site
○ All CPs are clear from filter fabric and excess chip and any excess material removed from on top service covers.
Action Point Records Required - Hold Point
Responsibility - SE / CE / PM / ER
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
Post Completion
3.01 - Field
Material Test Method Requirement - Asbuilt and  RAMM Data
Reference Documents - RAMM update sheet
Material Acceptance Criteria (Method) - See Asset Management Information Plan
Material Test Frequency - After works complete
Target Criteria - RAMM sheet 100% complete and accurate.
Action Point Records Required - RAMM Asset Update Sheet
Responsibility - PQE / CE / PM / ER
